description.value:
You repel effects that would hinder a creature or slow its movement. While under this spell's effect, the target ignores effects that would give them a circumstance penalty to Speed. When they attempt to Escape an effect that has them Immobilized, Grabbed, or Restrained, they automatically succeed unless the effect is magical and of a higher rank than the unfettered movement spell.

Spell Effect: Unfettered Movement
